text:
Hello. <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6>

I made theme Flow for HubSpot Theme Challenge 2021. I made listing on 25th January. 10 February I got mail with corrections by reviewer. But my theme didn’t have listing status 2/3 (HubSpot reviews listing). My listing became draft. I made fixes and resubmit theme again. But now my queue number 88. I think it is mistake with status by reviewer. I’m afraid of challenge’s terms.
Hey <@U0209DZTTH7>, I believe that’s normal behavior. When you resubmit, you get pushed to the end of the queue, don’t think it’s anything to worry about.
<@U021H3TV338> Yes. But theme should get 2/3 status for resubmit. But now it looks like I made NEW submit (1/3 status). <http://bomby.webtm.ru/status.jpg|Screenshot>

Yeah, that’s just what happens when you resubmit marketplace themes, normally. You have to go through the whole process again. Maybe they’re doing something different specifically for the contest, but I doubt it.
